name: noncommittally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not express an opinion or decision: Pat shrugged noncommittally. "Mmn," she replied non-committally. See
noncommittal
More examplesFewer examplesShe replied by grunting noncommittally.She smiled back noncommittally. "He's doing something for me," Matt replied non-committally.
